Lyrics:
1 ContributorTragedy Lyrics[Intro Chorus]
So slowly
We walk together through emptiness
When it’s do or die
Will we both survive
Through our tragedy
Yet lonely
You walk by yourself through the gates of death
When it is your time
Can you cut the ties?

[Verse 1]
Can’t shake it off
It’s easier said than done
To believe in it is one thing
But with these empty pains
I doubt I’ll see you soon
You would have never known
The hell that it caused within
Your love, a means to an early end

[Chorus]
So slowly
We walk togеther through emptiness
Whеn it’s do or die
Will we both survive
Through our tragedy?
Yet lonely
You walk by yourself through the gates of death
When it is your time
Can you cut the ties
And let go of these memories?
You might also like[Verse 2]
Tragedy
Pulls a hold of me
Consuming all of the silence
And the heart within
So filled with sin
You should’ve never shown me
What it means to be
Or what it is to seem
Perfectly happy
To remain myself
And let go of the guilt

[Chorus]
So slowly
We walk together through emptiness
When it’s do or die
Will we both survive
Through our tragedy
Yet lonely
You walk by yourself through the gates of death
When it is your time
Can you cut the ties
And let go of these memories?Embed
